name: DunkYou
description:
Created in 72hrs for the minijam 56, with the theme sky and the restriction to use two random words Warzone and Doughnut.

Story:
You wouldn't eat a dirty doughnut, but have you ever considered the doughnut's feelings?
In this game, you play as Dough the donut, and your purpose is being delicious. Reaching paradise (that perfect cup of Joe) can be a rough, hairy road. Avoid getting dirty (or hide your disgustingness) on your way to edibility, and go dunk yourself!

This project was not sponsored by Dunkin' Donuts.

Controls: 
WASD/Arrows for movement, space for jump.

Credits:
Art: Camonio
Implementation: @solroo

Acknowledgements: 
Character controller based on Mix and Jam's implementation of Celeste-like controls.
Music from Free Music Archive, by Lobo loco
Sound FXs from freesound.org
